website_summaries.verdict: Definitely a bargain, but you may get what you pay for in terms of quality.
pros: This battery-controlled cleaner seems to effectively remove makeup and grime from pores
Can be used in the shower
cons: Some users report it gets water inside the body of the brush easily

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet because I haven’t got my cleanser (different brand. Not Olay) in the mail yet. I tested this on my hand and I can tell it’s going to work great. Very soft brush heads-I love this thing already. Even came with batteries so that made my life a lot easier
customer_reviews.author: HannahP

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had wanted a high priced (over $120) for her birthday but she sent me a link to a 70% off sale. Long-story-short, they were sold out, so I asked her to shop around, because I wanted her to have one she liked (at 17 it's kind of important to have a really good skin care regimen). She was in target with a friend looking at school supplies and saw this. I found it on Amazon and there was even a check it coupon. My daughter loves it because the head is small enough to get around her nose, which other brushes dont.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED to 4 star! Great and economical home beauty appliance
customer_reviews.text: I use daily and battery still strong after a couple months. NOT as great as my 15 year old Clairsonic Pro but for 1/5th the price of Clairsonic is acceptable UPDATE: from average 3 star to 4 star. I still use daily and my skin seems as clean as with previous Clairsonic use. Wish there was a brush/accessory for moisturizer application or facial massage but this is great and I have promoted to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Happy Nana

customer_reviews.title: My First Cleansing Brush
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a pretty nice box with two batteries and two brushes. It is not too heavy to hold, which is important for me. If you turn it on it is pretty quiet and has only two settings. High & low. Its not rough on your face, its pretty soft which I didn’t expect. This is my first cleansing brush anyway. I’ve been using it for two weeks now. And so far I’m liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Vee

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle and great on sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is very soothing. I have very sensitive skin and have no problem using it every night. I feel it really helps cleanse and also brightens my skin. I am blond and fair so I have to be careful with products and I love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Teaco

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: The thing still works after months of usage => good. Also, I liked the two modes — gentle and intensive. I noticed that I use each equally, 50/50, so it suits my needs. Bought one for my skincare maniac friend after I tested mine on myself => goes well as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: lemmedie

customer_reviews.title: Favrite
customer_reviews.text: This is my second brush in 5 years, great price and good quality works just as well as the expensive brands
customer_reviews.author: Charlean Pope

customer_reviews.title: Ironically not suitable for water
customer_reviews.text: Used for only four months and it stopped working. The battery area got all rusted and for something that is near water often that is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Parisi

customer_reviews.title: Dying over this! Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is by far a great value for the price, compared to others on the market! I was hesitant thinking "how could a brush help me to cleanse my skin better"? That's why I use an exfoliant.. But I'll tell you that now, I'm a believer!! My pores have never been so clean and the only reason I gave this product a 4 star (instead of a 5 star) review for "how moisturizing is it" is because it's not really designed to be moisturizing per say. It's an exfoliant/cleanser, and then you moisturize after the use of this product. So the question seemed a bit out of place, but overall I have to say - FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great start
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after having my Clarisonic brush lost in a hotel during a work trip. This doesn't have as many options but for a basic model, it works well. You can take it in the shower with you and use it just like those more expensive brushes. The brush is very similar to what I've used but I'd say a little more rigid. The head rotates 360, which I'm not a fan of but again... given the cost, I can't complain too much about it. If you're curious about the facial brushes, this is a great place to start.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Worst product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe such product is by Olay or what I received may not be original. The bristles are hard, it didn't operate properly right after receiving the product. Planning to try buying the cleansing brush from nearby shop to check the authenticity of what I received from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for christmas and I love it so much! I have sensitive skin so I don't use it every single day, due to the roughness of the brush, making my skin feel burnt almost, but every couple days, its perfect! Decent price for the value of this brush, since the ones at the beauty stores are almost $100!!
customer_reviews.author: Shayna D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using this addition to my skin care routine. I will say I feel it does clean my face a bit deeper vs a wash cloth or make up wipes. It is slightly glitchy and I have only been able to use the highest speed one time. One time I turned off the device and walked back into the bathroom to see it was still spinning. I would say it adds something beneficial to my routine and would suggest everyone to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Price is okay if you're lazy
customer_reviews.text: My face does feel fresher and I do feel like I have a bit more of a glow. I'm lazy so it's nice to have a little help with that part of my routine. 🙂 Removes makeup that is left after towelettes
customer_reviews.author: Shino

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleansing brush. My face is clearer and I rarely get any pimples while using this. I went to PR and broke out really bad and got so tanned. This cleaned the break out in less than a week and as my skin was peeling this cleanser had my face still looking like nothing was peeling off. I love this thing and tell everyone to get it. Also i use my own soap with it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: denise sattall

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I haven't tried out any of the more expensive counterparts but I can't imagine those working much better than this one... It's definitely value for money. I keep it in my shower caddy and use it every other day with a mild exfoliant. My skin feels soft and smooth after use. I have sensitive skin and haven't had any adverse reactions. Just have to remember to replace the brush heads every 3-4 months. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Broke before I could use it once
customer_reviews.text: I put the batteries in and turned it on, everything worked. Then I set it down to put on my cleanser. turned it on... and then NOTHING. It will not turn on again. I've tried everything. Don't waste your time with this. Even when I turned it on the first time the head wobbled and it didn't seem powerful.
customer_reviews.author: j5th

customer_reviews.title: Great and Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised with this product. I just started a new skin care regimen and my other spin brush broke. In the mean time I thought I’d buy something affordable and this had great reviews. Not to mention it came the next day after I bought it! It is smaller than I’d expected but still works as good as my old expensive one. When it arrived I had a bit of trouble finding the battery insert but it’s on the bottom. READ INSTRUCTIONS! I think it’s key to have a good spin brush in your skin care routine. This product is great and the price is as well!
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Best face cleansing brush!
customer_reviews.text: This handy dandy face cleanser is the cutest! It's small and light weight. It cleaned my face so well, I love it. I have my bf using it too and he loves it as well. My face feels fresh and clean after it's use. Make sure you that you follow with your skincare regimen such as serums and moisturizers. Washing your face with this cleanser brush can leave your skin a little dry. Make sure to hydrate your skin soon after :)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had more expensive facial brushes . My suggestion is pay more you definitely get what you pay for this was a waste of time and money . I can’t even put batteries In its that cheap
customer_reviews.author: Dra

customer_reviews.title: Brush is very rough.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is so rough on the face, it actually hurts. I've always used Olay brushes in the past, always bought from CVS. I'm actually thinking this might be a fake. I dont have money to burn and purchase another brush right now. I've stopped using. It can't be good for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: For $ 25 it doesn't even work that well mite as well buy a cheap one and it works just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Mrright

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have used cosmetic brushes for facial cleansing for years but had a hard time finding them sturdy enough and easy to clean. Thought this was gimmicky but turns out it’s great. Cleans well without being abrasive, small enough for travel and replacement heads were available.
customer_reviews.author: Columbia, MD

customer_reviews.title: Face feels better after using
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and I love it. My face feels better makes me wonder if I was getting all the make up off before. I recommend this product I use it morning and night
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Oatsvall

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t turn on
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this in one day, but it doesn’t work. It came with batteries so I thought maybe the batteries were dead. Tried it with new ones, and nope it still doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: Short Handle
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several weeks now, it's fine, but compared to others I've had I find the handle a bit short and the price a couple of dollars too high. I haven't had to replace a battery yet, so it does run well.
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: Works so well!
customer_reviews.text: All of the other facial cleansing brushes were so expensive so I was very excited when I saw the price of this one. I'm so glad I got this one since it works so well and was such a great price. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: So. Much. Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Holy clean skin batman!! This seriously made my skin feel soooo clean and amazing I cannot tell you how smooth and deep cleaned it felt. And it comes with two brush heads so you’re good to go for months. I wish I got this sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: coloRADokay

customer_reviews.title: Not for me. Brush is to rough
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. I didn’t read the description thoroughly and wasn’t aware it used batteries. Given the price I am not surprised. The brush head is not soft and the way it rotates I don’t feel like I’m getting a thorough cleaning. I am in my 50’s and I feel as though it does more damage than good to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nconner

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! I’ll be buying the replacement scrub heads for the future. It doesn’t tear up my sensitive skin but exfoliates perfectly. It’s gentle and easy to use. There’s two different speeds also. Only takes two AA batteries- which it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Loledaz

customer_reviews.title: Average face cleaner...you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Merely an average device. Two speeds - seems battery life is good. Speeds are slow medium and slow. The brushes are nice - gentle on the skin. Just not a very high quality device even at approximately $25. Just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Kinne

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Comes with 2 brushes. Same model
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had one more speed setting. Me personally. But just about the right softness/ hardness for facial cleansing. Works great in the shower with your favorite facial soap. Leaves face feeling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great skin, less breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I use this face scrubber everyday. I can definitely tell a difference in my skin. I have had less breakouts than I normally do. I plan on using this device for a LONG time! It’s been over a month now and going strong.
customer_reviews.author: T Roe

customer_reviews.title: Small and Cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality! Feels cheap, materials feel cheap, switch feels cheap. Very small too. Definitely not worth $25 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: William Dickel

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to need another one. My granddaughter loves it too! Updated review I was going to get a second one until I saw the brush heads have been discontinued. That's a shame. We really liked this.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Parlet

customer_reviews.title: how well it works
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift . The person told me they are very pleased with everything about how well the brush works.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: More than worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is very cost effective and buying it on amazon is cheaper than Walmart. I have worn out two other over the years and to replace is still cheaper than a Clarisonic.
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works at first but then dies after so many uses
customer_reviews.text: The product was working great at first but it did irritate my skin a little because of the brushes, they weren’t that soft. I continued to use but then it started to stop spinning and after that it stopped working. I changed the batteries and all but I honestly think it was because of the water hitting it but there’s no way around that because it’s a facial brush cleanser. Maybe you guys should look into it being water proof!
customer_reviews.author: Nya

customer_reviews.title: favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite spin brush and the most affordable. Love that it comes with 2 extra brushes. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sarin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this face scrubber my face was breaking out and getting dry I started using this and haven’t had any issues since my face looks healthier and back to normal. And the bonus I can use in the shower and it was a good price
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Figgins

customer_reviews.title: Less Productive than Washing your Face the Regular Way
customer_reviews.text: This thing has no power and barely spins. I sent it back. Washing my face with hand power worked better.
customer_reviews.author: GFetchin'

customer_reviews.title: I really like this...
customer_reviews.text: I have always struggled with acne and when I apply my cleanser to this brush and let it do its thing, it feels so satisfying. I have used it twice so far and just feel much cleaner after use. It is like a subtle massage as well. I can see how over time, it may even improve the texture of my skin since it stimulates blood flow and cleans much deeper than if I was using my hands. Get one.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Riedlinger

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife love this olay cleansing brush. The facial brush are so soft, that she use it daily. She hopes that there are other replacement olay brush head available like foam/silicone/massage/body aside from facial brush. Overall good quality product!
customer_reviews.author: aldrin tolentino

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my girl friend, she told me she loves it! the brush is soft and very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: E.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This little brush works great! I just would like if they can maker a little bigger in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Flavia

customer_reviews.title: To rough
customer_reviews.text: Was way to rough in my face. Drys out my skin a ton. I have used other face brushes and I will not buy this one again
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Y’all.....
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you. I used to read reviews and would be super suspicious about anyone that said after one use they saw results but.... seriously after I used this for the first time last night my face felt so soft! I woke up this morning and for once my face was not already oily! I struggle with my oily skin and praise the lord for this!!! If you’re needing a sign to get this, this is it! So worth the money :)
customer_reviews.author: Bella Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so upset! First the package got lost so I had to replace it for it to not work! I’ve tried so many different batteries hoping it was just the batteries but it still wouldn’t turn on! I’m returning this cheap junk and getting a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love it so small i have had the same battery in for two months its not cheap but it's affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Tigist Nagia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very effective cleansing brush. I’ve seen major improvements in my complexion when using with my cleanser. The brush isn’t too rough and not to soft. It doesn’t irritate my face at all. Very glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Frias Clan

customer_reviews.title: Regenerist
customer_reviews.text: Can be a little finicky sometimes, but does the job. I’ll be looking to upgrade in about a year
customer_reviews.author: L Smith Jaxon

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I'd hoped. Bristles ARE soft but, battery operated doesn't allow for a solid spin, even with GOOD batteries.
customer_reviews.author: bflu

customer_reviews.title: Works for flaky facial skin
customer_reviews.text: I tried everything for my flaky, parched winter skin. This little gadget did the trick. It sloughed off the flakes the very first use and was very gentle on my face. I wish it came with a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Probably a little soft for a man face, but it seems to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great but harsh on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I want to start off with that this product did a great job removing my makeup and ocerall cleaning my skin. However, the bristles are quite rough on sensitive skin especially because the brush head spins versus using vibrations. I tried using the brush on my skin for almost a week hoping my skin would adjust but I couldn’t do it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kayley

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is making such a difference in my skin. Happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Stella & Darleen

customer_reviews.title: My skin is loving this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking to up my skincare routine for awhile now, and this was the first step! My pours tend to get clogged easily and this new brush helps get excess makeup off my face. Consistency is key, but all in all this is a great product so far! The brush seems to get a dirty quickly, so I'm happy to see that this product comes with two brush heads to get you started.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: REAL REVIEW it wouldn’t turn on. I tried the batteries that were sent and it would not turn on so i assumed the batteries weren’t working so I got some batteries of my own and still would not turn on. When i put in the batteries sent it moved to the right a little then stopped. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: nai

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I have super sensitive skin and it has just the right amount of aggressive yet gentleness. Would absolutely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly crosby

customer_reviews.title: Good for skin cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. I have been using twice a week and I don’t have a sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Eda K

customer_reviews.title: It was great
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful, it came the next day and when I got I opened and it was very simple to start and operate. When I used it , it was very soft on my face and it was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consider this brush today
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the purchase and the quality of the product. The spinning brush is easy on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: It’s not big at all
customer_reviews.text: First I thought it was big not that tiny it’s like a mini little thing you can give kids as a toy 🙄. It kinda looks big in the picture to me when I received it I was mad
customer_reviews.author: Lynscia Vilmeney

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: this product is amazing gorgeous so soft the brushes and very easy to put the batteries in.
customer_reviews.author: Katalina Pavon

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for softer skin
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush I use it everyday you’ll feel a difference in your skin after first use
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this brush. My face feels smoother and I am noticing less black heads and acne
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Fields

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: Does not spin very fast nor are the brush bristles firm enough to feel like it is really getting into your pores.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have always trusted olay. This product is great. The brush isn’t too hard like others so my skin isn’t irritated after using
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do much for me
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t really do much for me and I feel like it makes me break out even more. The brushes are kind of rough and don’t really grasp the cleanser. I wish they had cases or something to be able to put it in for traveling. I put it in a ziplock and the brushes ended up bending.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Khamsiri

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This item is a great value. The brush is easy to remove and clean. It works great on exfoliating your skin and the two speeds comes in handy depending on what part of your face you are cleaning. I recommend this to everyone I know looking for an affordable face brush.
customer_reviews.author: Almostgone

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I played myself buying this $25.00 brush! I’m so mad at myself, The $7.99 one works just as good!
customer_reviews.author: Nyeemah small

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Clean
customer_reviews.text: I love how the brush makes my skin feel after washing it. I was using a washcloth before, but no more. There are 2 speeds, but I use the lower one due to how powerful it is. My skin feels soft and it allows my face wash to work even better. It shortens my beauty routine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Seriously love this face cleaner. Wish I would've bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis atchley

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfaction
customer_reviews.text: When I received my product, it did not work. Tried it with brand new batteries and still it wasn’t working: I’m very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shivanie R.

customer_reviews.title: It’s an okay product .
customer_reviews.text: It’ll be different for everyone’s skin but overall this is an okay product. Not the best . It does help in cleanse the face but this is not necessary to have . Buy this only if you are not comfortable using your hands as a method .
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Head small. Bristles rough.
customer_reviews.text: The scrubber head is so small. I’ve bought scrubbers with bigger heads and gentler bristles for half the price on an off-brand face scrubber like this :/. So I’m pretty disappointed that switching to a known brand got me lower quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenates Skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin has improved greatly. Still see the fine lines but definitely a lot smoother than before. Compared to other products at triple the price, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: VJ -Houston

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Omg, amazing!!! SUCH a great price for a great brush!! My skin looks better than it ever has.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Allen

customer_reviews.title: I like it .
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot but the only thing I do not like is it doesn’t even include one moisturizer for your face ! It’s okay though !
customer_reviews.author: Syleena Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good Product when used gently
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and love this cleansing brush but can't use it daily as it is a bit harsh on my face. I do love how my face feels after using it. I liked it so much that I bought one for my daughter as well.
customer_reviews.author: shawnd56

customer_reviews.title: Not impressive as it looks like.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it’s simply a weak brush or the inserts could be more efficient. The cleansing can be superficial. You could probably get a better effect from a charcoal scrub...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tuma

customer_reviews.title: Bleh
customer_reviews.text: Hated it. No indication of how often it should be used, which didn't help. It made my skin break out. Also had super tender skin no matter how gently I used it. When I stopped using it my husband started and he hated it too. Just an awful investment.
customer_reviews.author: Kader

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: First time using it my face felt much smoother. Can not wait to see long term results.
customer_reviews.author: Lateefah

customer_reviews.title: Let’s exfoliate!
customer_reviews.text: Good product and I like that it came with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: It’s Great!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars all around😍🙌🏻 It works perfect! I haven’t had a breakout since I started using 😝
customer_reviews.author: Em🤠

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Cleansing my skin I have senesitve skin and oily as well was morining and night true is waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works but is rough
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty rough on the skin. I was expecting a smoother attachment but if you’re looking for a rough exfoliater it would be good. Would not reccomend for a daily cleanser
customer_reviews.author: Grace Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Not bad- a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: I have acne prone skin so I wanted something to really exfoliate. This works pretty well, I wouldn’t recommend it for sensitive skin though. Overall, I felt that the price was a little high for the product. It feels cheaply made to me. But that’s just me. Overall, a pretty good product for acne-prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: I like how compact it is, lightweight, pretty, easy to turn on/off and the price. However, the sonic is more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Fitch

customer_reviews.title: AMAZINGLY AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This feels so darn good to the face it don’t make any sense! EXTREMELY good quality brush! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Britney Fields

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit reluctant to purchase this brush because my skin is very delicate and to my surprise, it feels just right. I use it every day and makes my face feel much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and gentle on the face
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are very soft and gentle on my skin! I really love this product I just wish it was rechargeable. Otherwise it’s a very high quality product and I’m very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for the price, just make sure to replace the batteries often.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Seda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this works great. My complexion is clear, skin super soft, and fine lines are gone. Definitely highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved olay cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It’s very light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nitam Pant

customer_reviews.title: this is a must have
customer_reviews.text: after using this your face will be soft and super clean. I use mine every other day or every couple of days and my skin just looks better and better. you can literally see the dirt in the brush. You must get this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice to hold. Product is really compact and sturdy to hold. Bristle is nice and soft. Still suggest to purchase separate softer bristle if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bao Tran

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even get to used it, I took it out the box and put the batteries in and turn it on and it was working then I turned it off and back on just to make sure and it didn’t turn back on I pressed the power button maybe few times and it didn’t turn back on
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not very powerful but maybe it should not be as it might over-exfoliate then? Daughter likes it but batteries are already weakening (in less than a month of using 3 times per week).
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: What I loved most about this product is that it works great. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelyn

product_meta.title: Facial Cleansing Brush by Olay Regenerist, Face Exfoliator with 2 Brush Heads
product_meta.description: Are you feeling makeup buildup? Or a Tuesday so busy you’re already dreaming of Friday? Elevate your daily skin care cleansing routine with our dermatologist-designed Olay Regenerist Face Cleansing Device. This 2-speed facial brush boosts the power of your cleanser for a deeper clean — delivering superior cleansing on hard-to-remove makeup. Just dampen your face, apply your favorite Regenerist cleanser, moisten the brush head, and gently exfoliate your face for 60 seconds to remove those dulling surface cells. Rinse for soft, refreshed skin, and your face will be primed to maximize the hydrating effectiveness of your moisturizer and better absorb anti-aging ingredients, like Niacinamide Vitamin B3. So treat yourself to self-care with our water-resistant facial brush. Replace brush head every 3 months or sooner if there is visible wear.
feature_bullets: FACE CLEANSING DEVICE: This dermatologist-designed exfoliating facial brush boosts the performance of your cleanser for a deep clean
MAXIMIZE YOUR MOISTURIZER: Prime skin to maximize the hydrating effect of your moisturizer — like Olay Regenerist Whip
2 SPEEDS FOR 2 CLEANS: Choose between a daily deep clean or gentle exfoliation
MAKEUP NO MORE: Our facial cleansing brush delivers superior cleansing on hard-to-remove makeup
WATER RESISTANT: Safe for in-shower use

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
